precondition: The Windows XP desktop is visible.
action: Right Click on the desktop and click the menu item 'Properties'.

precondition: The desktop context menu is open.
expected_results: The context menu will close, and the Display Properties window will open.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' window is open and the 'Appearance' tab is active.
expected_results: The 'Screen Saver' tab will become active, displaying the screen saver settings.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' window is open and the 'Themes' tab is active.
expected_results: The 'Screen Saver' tab will become active. You will see options to change the screen saver, wait time, and other settings.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' window is open and the 'Screen Saver' tab is selected.
action: Click the down arrow on the 'Screen Saver' dropdown menu.
expected_results: A list of available screen savers will appear.

precondition: The 'Screen Saver' tab of the 'Display Properties' window is open. The 'Screen Saver' dropdown menu is open and the 'None' option is highlighted.
action: Click the '3D FlowerBox' option in the 'Screen Saver' dropdown menu.
expected_results: The '3D FlowerBox' option will no longer be highlighted.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' window is open and the 'Screen Saver' tab is active. The 'Apply' button is enabled.
expected_results: The 'Power Options Properties' window will open in front of the 'Display Properties' window.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' window is open and the 'Screen Saver' tab is active. The 'Power...' button is visible at the bottom of the window.
expected_results: The 'Power Options Properties' window will open in front of the 'Display Properties' window.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open with the "Turn off hard disks" dropdown menu open.
action: Click the "After 5 hours" option in the "Turn off hard disks" dropdown menu.
expected_results: The "Turn off hard disks" dropdown menu will close, and "After 5 hours" will be selected.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Power Schemes" tab is selected.
expected_results: The "Power Options Properties" window will close, and the "Display Properties" window will become active.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' window is open, showing the 'Screen Saver' tab.
action: Click the 'OK' button at the bottom of the 'Display Properties' window.
expected_results: The 'Display Properties' window will close. Any changes made to the screen saver settings will be applied.
